item.content:encoded:
May the Road Rise Up to Meet You, Irish Blessing Postcard

Hot Deals! May the Road Rise Up to Meet You, Irish Blessing Postcard – St Patricks Day Cards Popular May the Road Rise Up to Meet You, Irish Blessing Postcard It’s a great choice May the Road Rise Up to Meet You, Irish Blessing Postcard You can order itBeautiful inspirational quote postcard features an old Irish Blessing; "MAY THE ROAD rise up to meet you. MAY THE WIND be always at your back. MAY THE SUN shine warm upon your face; the rains fall soft upon your fields and until we meet again, MAY GOD HOLD YOU in the palm of His hand."" The back greeting prayer can be modified and used for many occasions, or deleted for a blank card._ Price:$1.45

Hot Deals! May the Road Rise Up to Meet You, Irish Blessing Postcard ($1.45)

Category : St Patricks Day Cards
